def get_init_file():

    # Init file must not exist, but it's parent dir must exist.

    os.makedirs(str(get_shared_folder()), exist_ok=True)

    init_file = get_shared_folder() / f"{uuid.uuid4().hex}_init"

    if init_file.exists():

        os.remove(str(init_file))

    return init_file
